short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, you can feed your own virtual pet and interact with it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Byte Buddy aims to be your browser's feathered companion! üê• With this extension, users can nurture and interact with their own virtual pet right in their browser. Byte Buddy's sole purpose is to provide users with a fun and engaging experience as they browse the web. The extension allows users to feed, play, and care for their virtual pet, adding an element of enjoyment to their browsing activities. Byte Buddy is a simple and easy-to-use tool designed to enhance users' browsing experience by introducing them to the world of virtual pets.

New Features 

- Now with dark mode support!
